mapper.select: SELECT u.user_email AS userEmail , u.user_nickname AS userNickname , u.user_name AS userName , u.user_birth AS userBirth , u.user_state AS userState , u.user_role AS userRole , u.user_walking_record_public_yn AS userWalkingRecordPublicYn , u.user_hospital_name AS userHospitalName , u.user_hospital_info AS userHospitalInfo , u.user_register_datetime AS userRegisterDatetime , u.user_suspension_end_datetime AS userSuspensionEndDatetime FROM user u JOIN joint_shopping_participation_user_list p ON (u.user_id = p.user_id) WHERE p.joint_shopping_group_num = #{groupNum} AND p.joint_shopping_user_delete_datetime = NULL ORDER BY u.user_nickname LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user u JOIN joint_shopping_participation_user_list p ON (u.user_id = p.user_id) WHERE p.joint_shopping_group_num = #{groupNum} AND p.joint_shopping_user_delete_datetime = NULL
SELECT user_courier_code , user_invoice_num , products_receipt_yn FROM joint_shopping_participation_user_list WHERE joint_shopping_participation_user_list_num = #{participationNum}
